title: Duck and pear salad
description: Seasonal pears and duck go beautifully together in this Chinese-style salad recipe.

method.Step 1: Make 6 slashes in the skin of the duck breasts and season with the Chinese five-spice.

method.Step 2: Dry-fry in a frying pan over a low heat for 6-8 minutes each side, until cooked through. Pour off the fat, rest, then slice.

method.Step 3: Add the honey and balsamic vinegar to the pan and warm through. Drizzle over the pears, some salad leaves and the sliced duck.
